field.label: Log Level
field.help: level of logs ex: debug, info and error .. etc

field.label: Writing logs to console
field.help: Enable this feature if you want to add debugging headers to ICAP response ex: X-ICAPeg-Shadow-Service

field.help: the host of web server which reponse with html message
